content.description:

Source: Adapted from Marion Goosens, “Schilders en de markt: Haarlem 1605–1635,” Ph.D. dissertation, Leiden University, 2001, 346–347.
content.question: In contrast to subject matter in the Dutch Republic, the pattern of subject matter of paintings in Catholic countries over the same time period would have been significantly different in part because of the prominence of which of the following artistic styles?

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
